results.name: Tower of Hanoi positions (A055662) converted from base 3 to base 10.
link: Z. Sunic, Tree morphisms, transducers and integer sequences, arXiv:math/0612080 [math.CO], 2006.
Index entries for sequences related to Towers of Hanoi
formula: a(n) = Sum_{j=0..floor(log_2(n))} 3^j*((-1)^j*floor((n/2^j + 1)/2) mod 3). - Corrected by _Stefano Spezia_, Oct 27 2018
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 06 2000
